Detailed Description

Inner class to represent the base Model's action.

Member Function Documentation

bool ModelAction::promoteMotion (  )  const

This function returns if the action promotes motion.

Only 'isImpacting' actions promote motion.

Returns:
Whether or not this action promotes motion.

uint32 ModelAction::sizeInBytes (  )  const

This function calculates the size in memory of the action.

Returns:
The size of the action and its members in bytes.

bool ModelAction::valid ( const ::Model &  model  )  const

This function checks the state and data of the Action to decide if it is in a valid state.

To be in a valid state the Action must satisfy the following:

  • Have a name
  • Reference an animation that exists in the model
  • If the Action is a movement action then the referenced animation must have an overall translation that is non-zero.

Parameters:
model The model that owns the action. The action need not be yet added to the model.
Returns:
Returns true if the Action is in a valid state.
